body.name: Moolan Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 6 in 1 Stick Vacuum Cordless Rechargeable with Power Suction, Brushless Motor LED Screen Vacuum Cleamers for Home Hardwood Floor Pet Hair
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 18 mins
features: 【Reduce Cleaning Time】The moolan cordless vacuum cleaner is equipped with an advanced brushless motor with suction power up to 24Kpa. The 6-level suction power is adjustable to meet most surface and floor cleaning needs, it can shorten your usual cleaning time by twice.

【Take away dust and give you a clean environment】The cordless stick vacuum cleaner is equipped with 2 washable HEPA and up to 5 layers of effective filtration systems, which can increase dust collection and filtration effects by 3 times, achieving 99.99% efficient cleaning. It’s best to clean roller brush and filters every two weeks.

【Clean the entire house with one full charge】The vacuum cleaner has been upgraded to a 7-cell 2200mAh removable rechargeable large-capacity battery, which greatly improves the running time and saves you from waiting for the battery to charge during cleaning work. (house area is about 20 square meters)

【Make sure there is nowhere for trash in corners to escape】The lightweight vacuum anti-tangle roller brush head can rotate 180° and 90° left and right and is equipped with an LED light head. Convenience allows you to easily pick up dust from every corner and normally hard-to-reach places.

【Adjustable length telescopic rod】10-inch adjustable length range, no suction leakage rod, allows dust to be sucked into the dust cup in one go. Release and empty the dust cup with one click. We recommend keeping it charged when not in use to ensure that the next time you use your cordless handheld vacuum, it's fully charged and delivering powerful suction.

【Anti-tangle V-shaped roller brush】 The upgraded V-shaped roller brush head can reduce the entanglement of short hairs and is also suitable for hardwood floors, marble, short-pile carpets, blinds, ceramic tiles, etc., protecting your floors from scratches. Small tool with cleaning brush head.
【Lightweight reduces stress on your arms】The entire main unit weighs 3 pounds. Whether it is roof cleaning or long-term cleaning work, it will not cause any burden on the arms.
【Wall-mounted tool allows your vacuum cleaner to be placed in a fixed location】The household vacuum cleaner comes with wall-mounted tool that is easy to store and keep standing.

【Buy with confidence】 Moolan cordless vacuum provide 12-month warranty, accessory replacement and 7*24-hour after-sales service to ensure a high-quality purchasing experience. Ideal gift choice for yourself, friends and parents.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: 🏆Powerful Suction & Brushless Motor 🏆3lbs Lightweight Cordless Vacuum Cleaner & Quiet Cleaning 🏆6 in 1 stick vacuum with LED Screen 🏆 7*2200mAh Rechargeable Detachable Battery 🏆Advanced High-speed Motor 20-40Mins Runtime Cordless Vacuum 🏆5 Stage High-Efficiency Filtration System with 0.7L Dust Cup 🏆No Dust Leakage Retractable Tube & 180° Rotatable Roller Brush Head with Lights, Lightweight, Headlight, Washable Filter, HEPA See more

productInformation.value: Host with battery, Retractable tube, Floor brush, 2 in 1 brush, Crevice tool, Adapter, Wall-mounted holder, User Manual See more

productInformation.name: Recommended Uses For Product
productInformation.value: 🎁The HEPA filter is washable, please keep the filter dry before installation. High-quality service: 12-month warranty + parts replacement + 7*24 after-sales service. 🎁Please place the wall-mounted product next to furniture so that the product remains in charging mode when not in use so that it has enough power for the next cleaning. 🎁Do not use this product to clean wet garbage; please use the first mode when cleaning small particles of garbage; use the second high suction mode to clean hair, etc. 🎁If you encounter tangles during use and the brush head cannot rotate normally, please take out the brush head immediately for cleaning. ❗❗ Please be sure to use the original adapter to charge the product.

productInformation.name: Specific instructions for use
productInformation.value: The 6 in 1 cordless stick vacuum cleaner comes with two accessories for efficient cleaning of floors and furniture as well as crevices. The Cordless Stick Vacuum meets a wide range of household cleaning needs for stairs and windowsills, sofas and beds, tables and curtains, cars, RVs and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a wonder!!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a stick vacuum for a long time. I wasn't impressed with what I was seeing and being new to the game, not understanding a lot.When I saw the Moolan vacuum mop and was able to understand the description and such, and the customer reviews I was very impressed. I decided to go ahead and buy it.After using it the first time I had a question, not a problem, and sent a message to the service center.They responded with the answer within a few hours. I was amazed, I thought it would be a few days.This is customer service above and beyond. The stick vac is doing excellent picking up debris and dog hair. I very happy with my purchase and the help I received from Customer Service.I will recommend this vacuum to everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow... I'm impressed
reviews.reviewText: We were looking for a nice rechargeable and light vacuum. We looked at several brands most of them on the $200.00 range and more. And we stumbled upon the Moolan vacuum for less than $100.00. The reviews were good and I said, I don't have anything to loose. What can I said... I'm very impressed with the performance and how easy is to use. For the money and performance I cannot find a better vacuum. Please be aware if you use the vacuum on high power, the battery will last less than 30 minutes. I have been looking for an extra battery with no luck but I hope the manufacturer will make it available at some point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The vacuum for people who hate to vacuum
reviews.reviewText: I hate to vacuum. In an effort to avoid this odious task, I’ve purchased a couple of robot vacuums in the past. They work pretty well, but leave something to be desired. They’re always getting stuck or choking on a kid’s toy or otherwise making themselves more of a pain than just vacuuming myself. And so I was back to doing the thing I hate.Enter this stick vacuum.Now, while nothing will make me enjoy vacuuming, this Moolan cordless stick vacuum helps eliminate some of the things about vacuuming I hate the most. I’m really impressed with it!It’s light—No struggling up and down stairs with a heavy vacuum. That’s pretty awesome!It’s cordless—No tripping over cords and pulling the plug out of its socket!It’s (relatively) quiet—This makes a lot less noise than either our upright corded vacuum or our robots!A few things to keep in mind:—I’m not sure how long the battery with run this vacuum before having to be recharged. I’ve easily gotten through three rooms and only lost less than half the charge according to the display.—It only comes with one battery, so you won’t be able to swap out a fresh one when you’re out of charge. You’ll have to wait four or five hours to recharge.—The dust receptacle isn’t huge. Depending how dusty your house if, you might be emptying it often.The bottom line: This is such a huge step up from traditional corded vacuums. Yes, I still hate vacuuming. But with this stick vacuum, I hate it an awful lot less! If you’re like me, you’ll find this a welcome change to the dreaded chore of vacuuming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the convenience of this lightweight cordless rechargeable battery powered vacuum. I like that it has an adjustable length handle and that the dust cup is easily removeable for easy cleanout. It has a surprising 6 level speed/power selection, which is move than necessary but it does make it easier to find the right level for area rugs which are always an issue with vacuums. Most of the time it gets used on the highest power setting for the best suction and performance which is adequate, but isn't as strong as our corded vacuum. But because of the convenience of cordless, we find we vacuum more often with this so the net result is the same. It's very easy to use and the beater bar attachment has LED lights that help to see, I don't like that it doesn't lock into an upright standing position, it's always loose. The beater bar is easily removable to remove fibers and hair that get stuck on it, and the vacuum comes with a special cleaning tool for that. The battery life is about 20 minutes per charge. It comes with a charging adapter that's specific to the vacuum and takes about an hour to reach a full charge, there's a display that shows charge level. Even though it doesn't have as strong a suction as our corded upright vacuum, it's adequate and we love the convenience of this ...so we use it more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I am so in love with this vacuum. I have a stick vacuum currently, but it is corded and very heavy to hang onto. I have mobility issues, so was looking for something that was lightweight and easy to use. This is perfect for my needs. This came with a mounting unit that I have attached to the wall in my linen closet, and when I am done vacuuming, it is very easy to store away. It has a good quality battery that charges fully and quickly. The battery is very easy to put on and takeoff. The attachments that came with the vacuum allow this to be used as a hand vacuum also. I have use some of the high dollar stick vacuums and while they worked well, they were way too expensive. This vacuum is affordable and within a good price range and does everything that those higher priced vacuums did. I especially appreciate how easy it is to go from my wood floors to my rug areas . This is very light and easy for me to use. I think it's probably the favorite vacuum I've owned. Definitely recommended to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where has this been all my life!
reviews.reviewText: I have a similar vacuum, but it is corded. Decided to give this one a try even though I wasn't sure about the suction power. It did not disappoint and now it is my favorite thing. Turning it on is kind of different, but you get used to it. It always starts at the lowest power setting when you pull the trigger button. If you want full power you have to turn the dial. I guess it makes sense because it is on a battery, but I am a full power all the time kind of person. I vacuumed every carpeted room and underneath every piece of furniture and still had 2 bars of juice. So amazing and now I use it almost every day.My only sort-of con would be to have the wall mount be a charge point. You have to plug the vacuum in directly which means you have a cable hanging around. I still love it though.
